message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. It's a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,600,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. Let's split the difference.  I'm willing to come down to $1,650,000.  This still gives me a good profit margin and allows you to get the product at a fair price.  Let's make this deal happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my target price. Would you be willing to come down to $1,600,000? I'm willing to meet you halfway on this one.
